name: Cloud Serpents
description:
Wake up in a strange stranded village after passing out in the desert followed by a giant Cow Baby ordering you to fly to the sky and defeat the Cloud Serpents.

This is a DEMO.
It includes the first part of the game only.

More will be added in the full version including:

  • Sky Brawls
  • Local 2 player
  • Improved sprites
  • Smoother animations
  • Full soundtrack
  • Improved sound effects
  • Creepier giant Cow Baby
  • More Cloud Serpents and interesting ways to defeat them

Sky Brawl Mode:

Sky Brawls are fast, intense,  in-air fights with the Cloud Serpents. Defeat the serpents by swinging with the grappling hook and using smart techniques. 2 Player is planned to be added in this game mode.

Controls:

A and D to move

W to jump

E to interact

Sky Brawls controls are in-game
